circumstances: Just after liftoff from Pottstown-Limerick Airfield, while in initial climb, one of the engine failed. The pilot lost control of the airplane that stalled and crashed in flames. All five occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
Stall during initial climb due to engine failure for undetermined reasons. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Powerplant failure for undetermined reasons, 
- Failed to abort takeoff,
- Failed to retract landing gear,
- Failed to maintain flying speed.
